org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver

类 TestAtomicOperation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.regionserver.TestAtomicOperation

  • public class TestAtomicOperation
extends Object
    Testing of HRegion.incrementColumnValue, HRegion.increment, and HRegion.append

      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  TestAtomicOperation.AtomicOperation 
      static class  TestAtomicOperation.Incrementer
      A thread that makes increment calls always on the same row, this.row against two column families on this row.
      static class  TestAtomicOperation.MockHRegion
